good game if u have goot trust factor
Easily one of the greatest games of all time.
Cool game. Racist depressed kids or emotionally-underdeveloped incels
The amount of money Lord Gaben has finessed me out of over this game and im still playing it, must be good. Or am I just a fool?
Prime needed for sure, fun game.
Não jogue este jogo é uma merda
otroligt roligt spel, det blir speciellt när ryssar är optimistiska till allt

super der'mo
ya sgorel v nei

Puh... Was soll man sagen zu CS:GO...
Cheater egal ob Prime oder nicht.
Der Rote Trustfactor obwohl ich diesen Acc seit 4 Jahren hab hilft da auch nicht.
Deranker und Griefer jede Runde wenn man alleine oder zu zweit sucht.
Und die Community ist Toxxic as ♥♥♥♥.
Nicht empfehlenswert meiner Meinung, da ich aber CS liebe muss ich dennoch nen Daumen hoch machen da es ESEA und Faceit gibt dort gibts keine bis wenige Cheater und ein besseres Ranking System.
This fucking game is so bad that even free players uninstall and want a refund
игра хорошая если против друзей. Читеры везде, Прайм купил 2 года назад, за это время на играл до ЛЕМа, в каждом ранге встречаются читеры. И на фейсите. ухожу в доту
Perfect game for anyone who enjoys being killed by shoulders
CS nin amk oyuncu bulup oyuna girmek 1 saat oyunda kanser olmak 5 dk amk. Sırf takımım yok diye rank keleş . Eğer dc veya wp grubu tarzı olan varsa eklesin
Rusça konuşmayı öğrendim, kanserlerle savaşmayı öğrendim, 14-0'dan comeback atmayı öğrendim, pingin ne kadar fazla olabileceğini ve daha bir çok şeyi bu oyunla beraber öğrendim. Teşekkürler CS:GO.
И в тот момент, когда уже всё приелось и надоело, запустили режим а-ля PUBG.
is a class game, i get toxic sometimes tho
Просто топ игра, люблю позалипать с друзьями, пообщаться и поиграть)
CSGO was one my first FPS game. And After playing a while I can say that if you learn this game you can be good at any fps game.
the only  thing you should know is play with friends, not randoms.
Enjoy this game, even though it is already 7 years old.. You will want to get better and better all the time
oyun güzel değil şuanki durumu ile gaben azcık istese hileleri bitirir ama yapmıyor çünkü gaben daha çok cs satıp bira göbeği yapıyor çünkü gaben zengin.
one of the best games out there. can never be bored of it. A GAME FOR LIFE
Топ за свои деньги, ну надо меньше читаков
cs go eo melhor jogo do stean

very competitive, especially if you use FaceIt, ECL or ESL 
Does take some getting used to, but when you know your call outs and spots its half the battle.
Good game, for time killing xd

muito bom 
toda a gente chama me de cheater, nao percebo pq e q ainda nao me contrataram me pos navi, o s1mple e uma merda
Ne incelemesi amk ben buraya sadece görev vardı o yüzden geldim, yüklemeyin amk oyununu çokta sikimde.
игра заебись проебал пол своей жизни на эту залупу больше третьей голд новы не поднимался вообще советую если любите член в своей жопе
Good game. I like the friendly people I meet along the way :)
